values.description: This indicator computes the T3 Moving Average (T3). The T3 Moving Average is calculated with the following formula: EMA1(x, Period) = EMA(x, Period) EMA2(x, Period) = EMA(EMA1(x, Period),Period) GD(x, Period, volumeFactor) = (EMA1(x, Period)*(1+volumeFactor)) - (EMA2(x, Period)* volumeFactor) T3 = GD(GD(GD(t, Period, volumeFactor), Period, volumeFactor), Period, volumeFactor);
